mapper.select: SELECT F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_IMG, F.FRN_OWNER, F.FRN_TEL, F.FRN_ZIP, F.FRN_STREET, F.FRN_DETAIL, F.FRN_JOIN_DT, F.FRN_START_TIME, F.FRN_END_TIME, E.EMP_NO FROM FRANCHISE_T F LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON F.FRN_NO = E.FRN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.EMP_ID = #{empId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FRANCHISE_T F WHERE 1 = 1 AND F.FRN_NO = #{frnNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FRANCHISE_T F SET F.FRN_IMG = #{frnImg}, F.MODIFIER = #{modifier}, F.MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE F.FRN_NO = #{frnNo}

UPDATE FRANCHISE_T F SET F.FRN_ZIP = #{updateDto.frnZip}, F.FRN_STREET = #{updateDto.frnStreet}, F.FRN_DETAIL = #{updateDto.frnDetail}, F.MODIFIER = #{modifier}, F.MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE F.FRN_NO = #{updateDto.frnNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FRN_NO , FRN_NAME , FRN_OWNER , FRN_TEL , FRN_ZIP , FRN_STREET , FRN_DETAIL , FRN_X , FRN_Y , FRN_START_TIME , FRN_END_TIME , FRN_IMG , FRN_JOIN_DT , CREATE_DT , CREATOR , MODIFY_DT , MODIFIER FROM FRANCHISE_T
SELECT F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_OWNER , E.EMP_NO FROM FRANCHISE_T F JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON F.FRN_NO = E.FRN_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
